pages.text: The $(thing)Water Pump$() gives you the ability to move water with electricity. It has a speed of $(thing)30mB per tick$().
The pump must be submerged in water.

Unlike the $(thing)Steel Pump$() which moves source blocks, the $(thing)Water Pump$() collects water from source blocks and transfers it to adjacent tanks.$(br2)$(thing)Pressurized Pipes$() can be set up to move water longer distances. $(item)$(k:key.use)$() while holding a $(thing)Hammer$() on a pipe to turn on/off extract mode.
Pipes set to extract can only $(bold)drain$() tanks, not fill them, and cannot connect to other pipes set to extract.
$(thing)Encased Pressurized Pipes$() are full blocks; useful for passing pipes through walls, floors, or ceilings.$(br2)Encased pressurized pipes act exactly the same as normal pressurized pipes.
